CmdLine: apk add --no-cache --virtual=build-dependencies 	build-base 	openssl-dev 	cmake 	musl-dev 	libmpdclient-dev 	curl 	tar && apk add --no-cache 	libmpdclient 	libssl1.0 && mkdir -p /tmp/source/ympd && curl -Sl "https://codeload.github.com/SuperBFG7/ympd/tar.gz/master" | tar xz -C 	/tmp/source/ympd  --strip-components=1 && cd /tmp/source/ympd && mkdir build && cd build && cmake .. -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX:PATH=/usr && make && make install && apk del --purge build-dependencies && cd /tmp && rm -rf /tmp/*
Commands.Name: run
